languages.text: Не выдержав ужаса скорой кончины во время одного из варп-перелетов, истерически хохоча и изрыгая проклятья в адрес Вольного Торговца, ведьма возопила, что "отворяет дверь", и обратила одну из палуб в манифестацию своей злой воли. Тысячи бормочущих ртов и лиц покрыли пол и переборки, сводя с ума каждого, кто слышал их нечестивые голоса, затягивая жертв внутрь и разрывая стальными зубами и языками. Идира наслаждалась царящим безумием, пока Вольный Торговец лично не положил{mf||а} конец ее грешной жизни.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира НЕДОБРОВОЛЬНО не носит псидампер

languages.text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.
languages.original_text: Не выдержав ужаса скорой кончины во время одного из варп-перелетов, истерически хохоча и изрыгая проклятья в адрес Вольного Торговца, ведьма возопила, что "отворяет дверь", и обратила одну из палуб в манифестацию своей злой воли. Тысячи бормочущих ртов и лиц покрыли пол и переборки, сводя с ума каждого, кто слышал их нечестивые голоса, затягивая жертв внутрь и разрывая стальными зубами и языками. Идира наслаждалась царящим безумием, пока Вольный Торговец лично не положил{mf||а} конец ее грешной жизни.

traits.locale_text: Unable to cope with the looming death during one of the warp jumps, the Wych exploded in hysterical laughter and hideous curses towards the Rogue Trader, cried out that she was opening a passage, and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads got covered in thousands of muttering mouths and faces, driving mad those who heard their unholy voices, dragging the victims inside and tearing them apart with steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the madness, until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put out of her misery.

The floor and bulkheads got covered in thousands of muttering mouths and faces, driving mad those who heard their unholy voices, dragging the victims inside and tearing them apart with steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the madness, until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put out of her misery.

languages.text: 在某次亚空间跳跃中，由于临近死亡，伊迪拉发了疯。她歇斯底里地狂笑起来，恶毒地诅咒着行商浪人，尖叫着说要“打开一条通道”。随后，她的意念召来了邪恶之物，遍布整层甲板。地板与舱壁上布满了成千上万的嘴和脸，以阴险的声音絮絮叨叨，把所有能听到声音的人都逼疯了。这些嘴巴将受害者拽倒在地，用钢牙和舌头将他们撕碎。而伊迪拉则一直陶醉于疯狂之中，直到行商浪人将她从痛苦中彻底解脱出来。
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: 在某次亚空间跳跃中，由于临近死亡，伊迪拉发了疯。她歇斯底里地狂笑起来，恶毒地诅咒着行商浪人，声称要“打开一条通道”。随后，她的意念召来了邪恶之物，遍布整层甲板。地板与舱壁上布满了成千上万的嘴和脸，以阴险的声音絮絮叨叨，把所有能听到声音的人都逼疯了。这些嘴巴将受害者拽倒在地，用钢牙和舌头将他们撕碎。而伊迪拉则一直陶醉于疯狂之中，直到行商浪人将她从痛苦中解脱出来。

languages.text: Während eines Warpsprungs verlor die Hexe durch eine Vision ihres bevorstehenden Todes den Verstand, brach in hysterisches Gelächter aus und überzog {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit einer grässlichen Schimpftirade. Sie kreischte, sie werde "die Tür öffnen" und verwandelte eines der Decks in eine Manifestation ihres bösen Willens. Der Boden und die Schotten wurden von tausenden von plappernden Mündern und Gesichtern bedeckt. Jeder, der ihre heimtückischen Stimmen hörte, wurde in den Wahnsinn getrieben und hinabgezogen, um von stählernen Zähnen und Zungen zerfetzt zu werden. Idira genoss den Wahnsinn, bis {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich sie von ihrem Leid erlöste.
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: Während eines Warpsprungs wurde die Hekatari durch eine Vision ihres bevorstehenden Todes den Verstand, brach in hysterisches Gelächter aus und überzog {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit einer grässlichen Schimpftirade. Sie sagte, sie werde "eine Passage öffnen" und verwandelte eines der Decks in eine Manifestation ihres bösen Willens. Der Boden und die Schotten wurden von tausenden von plappernden Mündern und Gesichtern bedeckt. Jeder, der ihre heimtückischen Stimmen hörte, wurde in den Wahnsinn getrieben und hinabgezogen, um von stählernen Zähnen und Zungen zerfetzt zu werden. Idira genoss den Wahnsinn, bis {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich sie von ihrem Leid erlöste.

languages.text: Ayant frôlé la mort lors d'un saut Warp, la Céraste perdit la raison et éclata d'un rire hystérique avant d'accabler {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'horribles malédictions. Elle hurla ensuite qu'elle devait « ouvrir un passage » et transforma l'un des ponts en manifestation de sa volonté cauchemardesque. Le sol et les cloisons se couvrirent de milliers de visages et de bouches murmurantes, et tous ceux qui entendirent leurs voix insidieuses sombrèrent dans la folie avant d'être déchiquetés par des dents et des langues d'acier. Idira se délecta de sa folie, forçant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne à mettre fin à ses souffrances.
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: Ayant frôlé la mort lors d'un saut Warp, la Céraste perdit la raison et éclata d'un rire hystérique avant d'accabler {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'horribles malédictions. Elle prétendit ensuite « ouvrir un passage » et transforma l'un des ponts en manifestation de sa volonté cauchemardesque. Le sol et les cloisons se couvrirent de milliers de visages et de bouches murmurantes, et tous ceux qui entendirent leurs voix insidieuses sombrèrent dans la folie avant d'être déchiquetés par des dents et des langues d'acier. Idira se délecta de sa folie, forçant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne à mettre fin à ses souffrances.

languages.text: Enloquecida por la perspectiva de su muerte durante un salto de disformidad, la bruja estalló en carcajadas histéricas y lanzó espantosas maldiciones contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Gritó estar «abriendo la puerta» y convirtió una de las cubiertas en una manifestación de su maldad. El suelo y las mamparas quedaron infestadas de miles de bocas y caras parlantes, volviendo loco a todo aquel que escuchaba sus perniciosas voces y despedazando a sus víctimas con dientes y lenguas de acero. Idira disfrutó del caos hasta que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona acabó con su sufrimiento.
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: Enloquecida por la perspectiva de su muerte durante un salto de disformidad, la bruja estalló en carcajadas histéricas y lanzó espantosas maldiciones contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Declaró estar «abriendo un pasaje» y convirtió una de las cubiertas en una manifestación de su maldad. El suelo y las mamparas quedaron infestadas de miles de bocas y caras parlantes, volviendo loco a todo aquel que escuchaba sus perniciosas voces y despedazando a sus víctimas con dientes y lenguas de acero. Idira disfrutó del caos hasta que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona acabó con su sufrimiento.

languages.text: ワープジャンプのさなかに迫りくる死の影に駆り立てられた魔女は、半狂乱の哄笑を響かせながらおぞましい呪詛の言葉を自由開拓者に投げつけた。彼女は「扉を開く」と叫び、ひとつの甲板に悪意をさらけ出した。床と隔壁は何事かをまくしたてる幾千の口と顔に覆われた。その声を耳にした者は知らぬ間に狂気に冒され、鋼鉄の歯と舌に引き込まれてはその身を裂かれた。狂気に堕ちたイディラは、自由開拓者が自らの手で救済してくれるまで、この狂宴にふけっていたという。
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: ワープジャンプのさなかに迫りくる死の影に駆り立てられた魔女は、半狂乱の哄笑を響かせながらおぞましい呪詛の言葉を自由開拓者に投げつけた。彼女は「扉を開く」と叫び、ひとつの甲板に悪意をさらけ出した。床と隔壁は何事かをまくしたてる幾千の口と顔に覆われた。その声を耳にした者は知らぬ間に狂気に冒され、鋼鉄の歯と舌に引き込まれてはその身を裂かれた。狂気に堕ちたイディラは、自由開拓者が自らの手で救済してくれるまで、この狂宴にふけっていたという。

languages.text: Bir öte sıçrama sırasında ölümden dönen cadı, delirip histerik kahkahalara boğuldu ve Hür Tacir'e çirkin lanetler yağdırdı. Çığlık atarak "kapıyı açacağını" söyledi ve güvertelerden birini habis iradesinin bir tecellisine dönüştürdü. Zemin ve bölme panelleri, sürekli konuşan binlerce ağızla ve yüzle kaplandı. Sinsi sesleriyle dinleyenlerin akıllarını yitirmelerine neden oldular ve kurbanlarını kendilerine çekerek onları çelik dişlerle ve dillerle parçaladılar. Deliliğin diyarlarında dolaşan İdira'nın acısına Hür Tacir bizzat son verdi.
languages.original_text: Driven mad by her looming death during a warp jump, the witch exploded in hysterical laughter and threw hideous curses at the Rogue Trader. She shrieked that she was "opening the door," and turned one of the decks into a manifestation of her ill will. The floor and bulkheads became covered in thousands of chattering mouths and faces, driving any who heard their insidious voices mad and dragging victims down to be torn apart by steel teeth and tongues. Idira revelled in the insanity until the Rogue Trader {mf|him|her}self put her out of her misery.

traits.locale_text: Bir öte sıçrama sırasında ölmesi an meselesi olduğu için deliye dönen cadı, histerik kahkahalara boğuldu ve Hür Tacir'e çirkin lanetler yağdırdı. Çığlık atarak "kapıyı açtığını" söyledi ve güvertelerden birini habis iradesinin bir tecellisine dönüştürdü. Zemin ve bölme panelleri, sürekli konuşan binlerce ağızla ve yüzle kaplandı, sinsi sesleriyle dinleyenlerin akıllarını yitirmelerine neden oldular ve kurbanlarını kendilerine çekerek, onları çelik dişlerle ve dillerle parçaladılar. İdira, Hür Tacir acılarına son verene dek deliliğin diyarlarında dolaştı.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира НЕДОБРОВОЛЬНО не носит псидампер
